name: Hero Boy
description: Hero Boy is a 2D horror/brawler set in the notebook of an 8 year old boy during a zombie outbreak. Fight through hordes of enemies, imaginary and real, to face your fears and protect your family!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Later Processor: 3Ghz or Faster Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 3000/Radeon HD 5450 or Better DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: Anything that can handle .oggs
